thread.title: Plum Play Australia reviewed by Leslee
thread.title_full: Plum Play Australia reviewed by Leslee

author: Leslee
title: Plum Play Australia reviewed by Leslee
text: After quite a few months going back and forwards with Plumplay whilst waiting for funding to come through, the item we had chosen was no longer being stocked. Plumplay were more than happy to replace the out of stock item with another item of our choice to the same value. It arrived shortly after and our ASD grandson loves it. We will be getting more play things in future.
